commit.message: Update original author info

Depend on expiration of OIDC token to expire cookie

Fixes: #47
Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Allow passing extra request values to the auth url

Fixes: #62
Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Added decorator to check a client role from Keycloak

Closes: #51
allow dictionaries to define client_secrets
fix encoding for basic auth

Support token introspection on tokens obtained via the implicit grant type

Since authentication via the implicit grant type doesn't involve client
secrets, `client_secret` shouldn't be part of the POST body when
introspecting a token. Supplying `client_secret` when it isn't
necessary can cause problems with certain OpenID Connect providers.

Fix single 'aud' claim without 'azp'

Closes: #66

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>
Don't fail on bad signature of id token cookie, e.g. if session hashing mechanism changes
Fixes #68 -- added salts to the signers

Deprecate Python 2.6

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>
Fix 54. Update docs imports to make it work with latest version

Bump version

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Update default to match commit 506ef55288a45183f0685c9655bf03442971da32
Made token type hint configurable, defaulting to existing behavior. Required for KeyCloak support.

Make it possible to get access token and refresh token

Fixes: #29

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Also encode for py3

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Correctly encode

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Encode state with base64

There seem to be ID Providers that do not handle the full %x20-E7 ascii spectrum
that is allowed for the "state" argument per the spec.
Let's just encode it with urlsafe base64.

Fixes: #32

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Validate that the openid scope is always requested

Fixes: #30

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Make cookie path configurable

Fixes: #31

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Fix using the correct token_type_hint value

Fixes #35

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>

Make error strings returned by validate_token have bool() as False

I did not apply the "principle of least surprise" with the validate_token API,
and users had to do explicit "if valid is True:", because the error strings
returned were also evaluating to True.
This change returns ErrStr objects, which evaluate to False, but otherwise are
the exact same as normal string objects.

Signed-off-by: Patrick Uiterwijk <patrick@puiterwijk.org>
